p: In terms of relative organ weight, dietary supplementation with EEO had no significant effect on relative weights of carcass (71.54 vs. 70.90%), breast (25.86 vs. 25.23%), thigh (20.30 vs. 20.47%), abdominal fat (1.50 vs. 1.47%), liver (2.86 vs. 2.91%), spleen (0.13 vs. 0.10%), and bursa of Fabricius (0.18 vs. 0.15%), pancreas (0.24 vs. 0.22%), and heart (0.51 vs. 57%) as compared with the CON group.
